sentences.en: All cheques should be made out to "EF International Language Schools"
sentences.cn: 所有支票的收款人都应是“英孚国际语言学校”。

sentences.en: At a later news conference, he said differences should not be dramatized.
sentences.cn: 在后来的新闻发布会上，他说不应夸大分歧。

sentences.en: He shouldn’t be so selfish.
sentences.cn: 他不该这么自私。

sentences.en: He's never going to be able to forget it. And I don't think he should.
sentences.cn: 他将永远都不会忘记它。而且我认为他也不应该忘记。

sentences.en: I believe that a journalist should be completely objective.
sentences.cn: 我认为新闻记者不应当有丝毫偏见。

sentences.en: I feel as if I should break into song.
sentences.cn: 我觉得自己应该放声歌唱。

sentences.en: I should exercise more.
sentences.cn: 我应该多锻炼。

sentences.en: I should point out that these estimates cover just the hospital expenditures.
sentences.cn: 我应该指出，这些估算仅包括医院的费用。

sentences.en: I should stay in bed if I were you .
sentences.cn: 我要是你，就卧床休息。

sentences.en: In warm weather, you should wear clothing that is cool and comfortable.
sentences.cn: 在热天里，应该穿凉快舒适的衣服。

sentences.en: Should our children be taught to swim at school?
sentences.cn: 我们的孩子应该在学校学游泳吗？

sentences.en: Stop asking questions! You should know when enough is enough.
sentences.cn: 别问问题了！你应该知道什么时候该适可而止。

sentences.en: The direction of the prevailing winds should be taken into account.
sentences.cn: 应该将盛行风的方向考虑在内。

sentences.en: The notion that art should be controlled by intellectuals sickened him.
sentences.cn: 他讨厌艺术应由知识分子所掌控的观点。

sentences.en: The road divides; you should take the right fork.
sentences.cn: 路在这里分了岔；你应该走右边一条。

sentences.en: They said the present system of military conscription should be phased out.
sentences.cn: 他们说，当前的征兵体系应当逐步废除。

sentences.en: Vacuum-packed ham slices should be unwrapped 30 minutes before serving.
sentences.cn: 真空包装的火腿片应在食用前30分钟把包装除去。

sentences.en: What should I do? Should I trust him?
sentences.cn: 我该怎么办？我应该相信他吗？

sentences.en: Why should a great community like a university be afraid of nihilism?
sentences.cn: 为什么像大学这样人才济济的社区要害怕虚无主义呢？

sentences.en: Why should anyone want to marry Tony?
sentences.cn: 怎么竟然会有人意嫁给托尼？

sentences.en: You should also make your views known to your local MP.
sentences.cn: 你也应该让本地议员了解你的观点。

sentences.en: You should read his new book.
sentences.cn: 你应该读一读他的新书。

sentences.en: Your partner should then pass the ball back to you.
sentences.cn: 然后你的搭档应该将球回传给你。

phrases.tran_cn: 我该怎么办；我应该做些什么

trans.tran_en: used to say what is the right or sensible thing to do

trans.tran_cn: 应当，应该 〔用于提供或征求建议〕
trans.tran_en: used to give or ask for advice
used to give or ask for advice
used to say what is the right or sensible thing to do
You use should when you are saying what would be the right thing to do or the right state for something to be in
